### Assumptions applied in Analysis Rational

- **General ICD-10 Coding**: It is assumed that ICD-10 Coding was performed abiding by established coding manuals.

- **ICD-10 HIV Coding**: It is assumed that Coding of HIV-associated diagnoses was performed abiding by the [German HIV coding manual](https://www.zi.de/themen/medizin/kodierung/zi-manuale) (Versions published between 2005 and 2023) supplied by the [Zentralinstitut kassen√§rztliche Versorgung](https://www.zi.de/).
